annotated.name: splendom baker street
annotated.text:
baker street 221b london united kingdom

baker street 221b london united kingdom

1 bedroom apartment experience the charm of marylebone in this sophisticated 1 bedroom apartment located in the historic baker street district perfectly situated for business consultants and academics this residence offers seamless connectivity to the city center via the nearby tube station enjoy morning coffee on your private balcony overlooking the bustling street below or prepare a meal in the fully equipped kitchen featuring modern appliances the unit includes a spacious living area with a dedicated work desk and high-speed wifi ensuring productivity for remote professionals the building features a 24-hour concierge and elevator access making your stay effortless splendom baker street combines classic english architecture with contemporary interior design offering a unique home away from home note that layouts may vary slightly between units contact our team for specific inquiries regarding long-term corporate stays

annotated.name: splendom champs elysees
annotated.text:
avenue des champs-elysees 50 paris france

3 bedroom apartment indulge in luxury living at splendom champs elysees situated on the world most famous avenue this expansive 3 bedroom residence is designed for families or executive groups seeking unparalleled comfort in the heart of paris the apartment boasts high ceilings parquet flooring and a spacious lounge area perfect for entertaining guests each bedroom features a plush king-size bed and ensuite bathroom amenities include central air conditioning smart tv with international channels and a nespresso coffee machine for your daily caffeine fix residents have exclusive access to the building's fitness center and secure parking option in the underground garage located steps away from luxury boutiques and fine dining this is the ultimate parisian address for short or long term rentals weekly housekeeping ensures your home remains pristine throughout your stay

annotated.name: splendom alexanderplatz
annotated.text:
alexanderplatz 1 berlin germany

studio apartment discover modern urban living at splendom alexanderplatz located in the vibrant mitte district of berlin this efficient studio apartment is ideal for solo travelers and digital nomads looking for a central base the open-plan layout maximizes space featuring a comfortable sleeping area kitchenette with microwave and dishwasher and a stylish bathroom large windows flood the space with natural light offering views of the iconic tv tower building amenities include a communal laundry service bike storage and a pet friendly policy allowing you to bring your furry friends excellent transport links are right outside your door connecting you to all parts of the city quickly and easily all utilities are included in the rental price making this a hassle-free option for your stay in berlin
